thread.title: SAP Acquires French Cloud-Computing Company Multiposting
thread.title_full: SAP Acquires French Cloud-Computing Company Multiposting

author: morningstar.com
title: SAP Acquires French Cloud-Computing Company Multiposting
text:
By Christopher Alessi
FRANKFURT--German business software provider SAP SE (SAP) said Monday it has acquired French cloud-computing company Multiposting, which provides software for the automatic posting of jobs and internships on the internet.
Multiposting, based in Paris, has 800 customers and more than 15,000 users, SAP said. SAP did not disclose the value of the transaction.
The acquisition is part of broader effort by SAP Chief Executive Bill McDermott to shift the company's focus away from on-premise software to Internet cloud based offerings.
SAP last year purchased for 8.2 billion euros ($9.3 billion) U.S.-based cloud expense management software provider Concur Technologies Inc., making SAP the second-largest enterprise cloud-service company by revenue behind Salesforce.com Inc.
Write to Christopher Alessi at christopher.alessi@wsj.com
 12, 2015 10:39 ET (14:39
